    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:a-priori2" xml:id="S0.E12">
      <tags>
        <tag>(12)</tag>

      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\int_{0}^{\infty}\|u(t,\cdot)\|_{L^{6}}^{6}\,dt{\leqslant}C(\|u_{0}\|_{L^{2}})." text="((integral _ 0) ^ infinity)@(((norm@(u * open-interval@(t, cdot))) _ (L ^ 6)) ^ 6 * differential-d@(t)) less= C * (norm@(u _ 0)) _ (L ^ 2)" xml:id="S0.E12.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E12.m1.3"/>
            <XMWrap>

                  <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>

                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                                  <XMRef idref="S0.E12.m1.2"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>

      <tags>
        <tag>(13)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">13</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="E_{\kappa}(t):=\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\frac{1}{2}\,|\nabla u(t,x)|^{2}+V(x)|%&#10;u(t,x)|^{2}+\frac{\lambda}{2}\,|u(t,x)|^{4}+\kappa|u(t,x)|^{6}{\mathrm{d}}x," text="E _ kappa * t assign (integral _ (R ^ 3))@((1 / 2) * (absolute-value@(nabla@(u) * open-interval@(t, x))) ^ 2) + V * x * (absolute-value@(u * open-interval@(t, x))) ^ 2 + (lambda / 2) * (absolute-value@(u * open-interval@(t, x))) ^ 4 + kappa * (absolute-value@(u * open-interval@(t, x))) ^ 6 * d * x" xml:id="S0.E13.m1">
        <XMath>

  <para xml:id="p24">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex17">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\rho|\nabla u|^{2}=|{\overline{{u}}}\nabla u|^{2}=|{\mathrm{Re}}({\overline{{u%&#10;}}}\nabla u)|^{2}+|{\mathrm{Im}}({\overline{{u}}}\nabla u)|^{2}={\frac{1}{{4}}%&#10;}|\nabla\rho|^{2}+|J|^{2}," text="rho * (absolute-value@(nabla@(u))) ^ 2 = (absolute-value@(overline@(u) * nabla@(u))) ^ 2 = (absolute-value@(Re * overline@(u) * nabla@(u))) ^ 2 + (absolute-value@(Im * overline@(u) * nabla@(u))) ^ 2 = (1 / 4) * (absolute-value@(nabla@(rho))) ^ 2 + (absolute-value@(J)) ^ 2" xml:id="S0.Ex17.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex17.m1.2"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex17.m1.2">
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex17.m1.2.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>

                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>

                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="true">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>

              </Math></td>

      </equation>

      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\frac{d}{dt}\,E_{\kappa}(t)=&amp;\displaystyle-\sigma%&#10;\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho|\nabla\rho|^{2}\,dx-(\sigma-6\kappa)\int_{{{%&#10;\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho^{2}|\nabla u|^{2}\,dx-2\sigma\lambda\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}%&#10;^{3}}\rho^{4}\,dx\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle-6\kappa\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho{\left|{{\frac{1}{2}}\nabla%&#10;\rho-J}\right|}^{2}\,dx-6\sigma\kappa\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho^{5}\,dx-%&#10;\sigma\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}V(x)\rho^{3}\,dx.\end{split}" text="(d / (d * t)) * E _ kappa * t = - sigma * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho * (absolute-value@(nabla@(rho))) ^ 2 * differential-d@(x)) - (sigma - 6 * kappa) * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(nabla@(u))) ^ 2 * differential-d@(x)) - 2 * sigma * lambda * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 4 * differential-d@(x)) - 6 * kappa * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho * (absolute-value@((1 / 2) * nabla@(rho) - J)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(x)) - 6 * sigma * kappa * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 5 * differential-d@(x)) - sigma * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(V * x * rho ^ 3 * differential-d@(x))" xml:id="S0.E14.m1">

  <para xml:id="p28">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex21">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho^{4}\,dx{\leqslant}{\frac{1}{{2{\varepsilon}}}}%&#10;\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho^{3}\,dx+\frac{\varepsilon}{2}\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}%&#10;}^{3}}\rho^{5}\,dx," text="(integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 4 * differential-d@(x)) less= (1 / (2 * varepsilon)) * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 3 * differential-d@(x)) + (varepsilon / 2) * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 5 * differential-d@(x))" xml:id="S0.Ex21.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex21.m1.1"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex21.m1.1">
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leqslant" role="RELOP">⩽</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

  <para xml:id="p29">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:E1" xml:id="S0.E15">
      <tags>
        <tag>(15)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">15</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\frac{d}{dt}\,E_{\kappa}(t){\leqslant}&amp;\displaystyle%&#10;-\sigma\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho|\nabla\rho|^{2}\,dx-(\sigma-6\kappa)\int_%&#10;{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho^{2}|\nabla u|^{2}\,dx-\sigma\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}%&#10;V(x)\rho^{3}\,dx\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle-6\kappa\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho{\left|{{\frac{1}{2}}\nabla%&#10;\rho-J}\right|}^{2}\,dx-C_{1}({\varepsilon})\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho^{5}%&#10;\,dx+C_{2}({\varepsilon})\int_{{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3}}\rho^{3}\,dx.\end{split}" text="(d / (d * t)) * E _ kappa * t less= (- sigma * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho * (absolute-value@(nabla@(rho))) ^ 2 * differential-d@(x)) - (sigma - 6 * kappa) * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(nabla@(u))) ^ 2 * differential-d@(x)) - sigma * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(V * x * rho ^ 3 * differential-d@(x)) - 6 * kappa * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho * (absolute-value@((1 / 2) * nabla@(rho) - J)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(x)) - C _ 1 * varepsilon * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 5 * differential-d@(x))) + C _ 2 * varepsilon * (integral _ (R ^ 3))@(rho ^ 3 * differential-d@(x))" xml:id="S0.E15.m1">

  <para xml:id="p38">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:dispest" xml:id="S0.E16">
      <tags>
        <tag>(16)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">16</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\lVert U(t)f\rVert_{L^{\infty}({{\mathbb{R}}}^{d})}{\leqslant}\frac{C}{|t|^{d/%&#10;2}}\lVert f\rVert_{L^{1}({{\mathbb{R}}}^{d})},\quad\text{for }|t|{\leqslant}\delta," text="formulae@((norm@(U * t * f)) _ (L ^ infinity * R ^ d) less= (C / (absolute-value@(t)) ^ (d / 2)) * (norm@(f)) _ (L ^ 1 * R ^ d), [for ] * absolute-value@(t) less= delta)" xml:id="S0.E16.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E16.m1.7"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMDual xml:id="S0.E16.m1.7">
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E16.m1.7.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E16.m1.7.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.E16.m1.7.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leqslant" role="RELOP">⩽</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.E16.m1.7.1.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
<!--  %**** String Line 200 **** -->                          <XMTok name="lVert" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">∥</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S0.E16.m1.7.1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S0.E16.m1.4"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E16.m1.4">t</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="rVert" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">∥</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.E16.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>

  <para xml:id="p42">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:strichnl" xml:id="S0.Ex34">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\Big{\|}\int_{I\cap\{s\leq t\}}U(t-s)F(s)\,ds\Big{\|}_{L^{q_{1}}(I;L^{r_{1}})}%&#10;{\leqslant}C(r_{1},r_{2},d)|I|^{1/q_{1}}\|F\|_{L^{q^{\prime}_{2}}(I;L^{r^{%&#10;\prime}_{2}})}." text="(norm@((integral _ [I∩{s≤t}])@(U * (t - s) * F * s * differential-d@(s)))) _ (L ^ (q _ 1) * list@(I, L ^ (r _ 1))) less= C * vector@(r _ 1, r _ 2, d) * (absolute-value@(I)) ^ (1 / q _ 1) * (norm@(F)) _ (L ^ ((q ^ prime) _ 2) * list@(I, L ^ ((r ^ prime) _ 2)))" xml:id="S0.Ex34.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex34.m1.9"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex34.m1.9">

                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex34.m1.9.1">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                          <XMArg rule="Subscript">
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMArg>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex34.m1.9.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex34.m1.5"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex34.m1.5">s</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="160%" meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>

    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:duhamel" xml:id="S0.E17">
      <tags>
        <tag>(17)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">17</tag>
      </tags>

  <para xml:id="p53">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:103" xml:id="S0.Ex47">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\|u\|_{S_{\Sigma}}{\leqslant}\sup_{q}|I|^{1/q}\left(\|u_{0}\|_{\Sigma}+{%&#10;\varepsilon}^{2}|I|^{1/2}\|u\|_{S_{\Sigma}}+{\varepsilon}^{4}\|u\|_{S_{\Sigma}%&#10;}\right)." text="(norm@(u)) _ S _ Sigma less= (supremum _ q)@((absolute-value@(I)) ^ (1 / q) * ((norm@(u _ 0)) _ Sigma + varepsilon ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(I)) ^ (1 / 2) * (norm@(u)) _ S _ Sigma + varepsilon ^ 4 * (norm@(u)) _ S _ Sigma))" xml:id="S0.Ex47.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex47.m1.6"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex47.m1.6">
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leqslant" role="RELOP">⩽</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex47.m1.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex47.m1.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="Sigma" role="UNKNOWN">Σ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.Ex47.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex47.m1.2">I</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex47.m1.6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex47.m1.6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S0.Ex47.m1.6.1.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p61">
    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="S0.EGx9">
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:strich1" xml:id="S0.Ex54">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\|\nabla u\|_{L^{q}_{t}L^{r}_{x}(I\times{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3})}%&#10;\lesssim\|\nabla u(t^{\ast})\|_{L^{2}({{\mathbb{R}}}^{3})}+\|u\|_{L^{10/3}_{t,%&#10;x}}\|u\|_{L^{10}_{t,x}}\|\nabla u\|_{L^{10/3}_{t,x}}+\|u\|_{L^{10}_{t,x}}^{4}%&#10;\|\nabla u\|_{L^{10/3}_{t,x}}." text="(norm@(nabla@(u))) _ ((L ^ q) _ t * (L ^ r) _ x * I * R ^ 3) less-than-or-similar-to (norm@(nabla@(u) * t ^ ast)) _ (L ^ 2 * R ^ 3) + (norm@(u)) _ (L ^ (10 / 3)) _ (list@(t, x)) * (norm@(u)) _ (L ^ 10) _ (list@(t, x)) * (norm@(nabla@(u))) _ (L ^ (10 / 3)) _ (list@(t, x)) + ((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ 10) _ (list@(t, x))) ^ 4 * (norm@(nabla@(u))) _ (L ^ (10 / 3)) _ (list@(t, x))" xml:id="S0.Ex54.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.Ex54.m2.16"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex54.m2.16">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-similar-to" name="lesssim" role="RELOP">≲</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex54.m2.16.1">

                      </XMDual>

  <para xml:id="p62">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:strich2" xml:id="S0.Ex55">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\|u\|_{L^{q}_{t}L^{r}_{x}(I\times{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3})}\lesssim\|u(t^{\ast})\|_{%&#10;L^{2}({{\mathbb{R}}}^{3})}+\|u\|_{L^{10}_{t,x}}\|u\|_{L^{10/3}_{t,x}}^{2}+\|u%&#10;\|_{L^{10}_{t,x}}^{4}\|u\|_{L^{10/3}_{t,x}}." text="(norm@(u)) _ ((L ^ q) _ t * (L ^ r) _ x * I * R ^ 3) less-than-or-similar-to (norm@(u * t ^ ast)) _ (L ^ 2 * R ^ 3) + (norm@(u)) _ (L ^ 10) _ (list@(t, x)) * ((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ (10 / 3)) _ (list@(t, x))) ^ 2 + ((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ 10) _ (list@(t, x))) ^ 4 * (norm@(u)) _ (L ^ (10 / 3)) _ (list@(t, x))" xml:id="S0.Ex55.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex55.m1.16"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex55.m1.16">
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-similar-to" name="lesssim" role="RELOP">≲</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex55.m1.11"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex55.m1.11">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>

    <equation labels="LABEL:eq:strich_tot" xml:id="S0.Ex56">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\|u\|_{S^{1}(I\times{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3})}\lesssim\|\nabla u(t^{\ast})\|_{L^{2}(%&#10;{{\mathbb{R}}}^{3})}+\|u\|_{L^{10}_{t,x}}\|\psi\|_{S^{1}}^{2}\\&#10;+\|u\|_{L^{10}_{t,x}}^{4}\|u\|_{S^{1}}." text="(norm@(u)) _ (S ^ 1 * I * R ^ 3) less-than-or-similar-to (norm@(nabla@(u) * t ^ ast)) _ (L ^ 2 * R ^ 3) + (norm@(u)) _ (L ^ 10) _ (list@(t, x)) * ((norm@(psi)) _ (S ^ 1)) ^ 2 + ((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ 10) _ (list@(t, x))) ^ 4 * (norm@(u)) _ (S ^ 1)" xml:id="S0.Ex56.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex56.m1.12"/>

  <para xml:id="p67">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex60">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\lim_{t\to T}\|u(t,\cdot)\|_{\Sigma}=\infty," text="(limit _ (t to T))@((norm@(u * open-interval@(t, cdot))) _ Sigma) = infinity" xml:id="S0.Ex60.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex60.m1.3"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex60.m1.3">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">lim</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex60.m1.3.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex60.m1.3.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S0.Ex60.m1.1"/>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>

              </XMApp>

          </XMDual>
        </XMath>
      </Math>
    </equation>
  </para>

  <para xml:id="p72">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex67">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\|u\|_{L^{p+3}}^{p+3}{\leqslant}\|u\|_{L^{p+1}}^{\frac{(p-3)(p+1)}{p-1}}\,\|u%&#10;\|_{L^{2p}}^{\frac{4p}{p-1}}." text="((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ (p + 3))) ^ (p + 3) less= ((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ (p + 1))) ^ (((p - 3) * (p + 1)) / (p - 1)) * ((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ (2 * p))) ^ ((4 * p) / (p - 1))" xml:id="S0.Ex67.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex67.m1.6"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex67.m1.6">
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leqslant" role="RELOP">⩽</XMTok>
                <XMApp>

                  <XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>

                        <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="S0.EGx11">

  <para xml:id="p81">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex77">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\lVert u\rVert_{L^{4}}^{4}{\leqslant}C\lVert u\rVert_{L^{2}}^{4-d}\,\lVert%&#10;\nabla u\rVert_{L^{2}}^{d}," text="((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ 4)) ^ 4 less= C * ((norm@(u)) _ (L ^ 2)) ^ (4 - d) * ((norm@(nabla@(u))) _ (L ^ 2)) ^ d" xml:id="S0.Ex77.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex77.m1.3"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex77.m1.3">
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leqslant" role="RELOP">⩽</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex77.m1.1"/>
